author: Prâwãsh Thãpá Sømaï Møgar
title: Comment on One Wheel Electric Hoverboard by Prâwãsh Thãpá Sømaï Møgar
text:
One Wheel Electric Hoverboard Posted 5 days ago 
Hoverboard is new skateboard-like vehicle with a single wheel placed centrally under the board. It is powered, and it features a self-balancing system to move around. 
There is also designed an app to fully access the Hoverboard: Activate your Hoverboard Check charge level and battery health Set Speed Limit (for each setup user) Lock your Hoverboard Log riding data, max-speed, avg-speed, distance traveled, etc. Protect your Hoverboard from theft Customize the lighting Customize the LED Bar Graphs Play Music and customize sound 
  backers can get one with a pledge of $3,775. Shipping is estimated to start in July 2016, and will be available anywhere.
